## hueToHex() function

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use Blockly.utils.colour.hueToHex(). (2021 December)
> 

Convert a hue (HSV model) into an RGB hex triplet.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function hueToHex(hue: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  hue | number | Hue on a colour wheel (0-360).  RGB code, e.g. '\#5ba65b'. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
